cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - HAY 16th, 1913,MORNING,1* Considerable artillery activity is-reported on the front METEREN - LA CLYTTE *2* We carried out a raid last night in the neighbourhood of GAVRELLE and captured 3 prisoners.5. Considerable gas shelling of our lines south of ALBERT is reported.4% Enomy aerial activity was very marked during last night.General Staff.war office, s.w,i, jFop the persona! informatk May loth^ 1918;. - of.the Minister only,Issued at;T^7So"pTmT
